original_text: But if ye refuse and rebel, ye shall be devoured with the sword: for the mouth of the Lord hath spoken it.
korean_text: 너희가 거절하여 배반하면 칼에 삼켜지리라 여호와의 입의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: But if ye refuse and rebel
ye shall be devoured with the sword
for the mouth of the Lord hath spoken it
